title: Icebreaker
author: Hannah Grace
description: A figure skater and a hockey player are forced to share a rink, leading to sparks flying both on and off the ice.

title: Wildfire
author: Hannah Grace
description: A heartwarming and fiery romance about navigating love and second chances in unexpected places.

title: Daydream
author: Hannah Grace
description: A dreamy tale of romance and ambition, where two souls find solace in each other amid life's chaos.

title: Better Than the Movies
author: Lynn Painter
description: A charming rom-com about a high school senior who finds herself falling for her childhood crush, with a bit of movie magic and a whole lot of heart.

title: Flawless
author: Elsie Silver
description: A bull rider and his feisty publicist must team up, but their growing connection threatens to upend everything.

title: Heartless
author: Elsie Silver
description: A single dad and a free-spirited nanny clash in this sweet and steamy tale of unexpected love.

title: Powerless
author: Elsie Silver
description: Friends-to-lovers romance about discovering the strength to love and be loved in return.

title: Reckless
author: Elsie Silver
description: An enemies-to-lovers romance set in the charming small town of Chestnut Springs.

title: Hopeless
author: Elsie Silver
description: A gripping and emotional romance about finding love amidst brokenness and starting over.

title: On the Line
author: Naomi Loud
description: A sizzling romance where love and ambition collide as two passionate individuals fight for their dreams.

title: The Love Hypothesis
author: Ali Hazelwood
description: A STEM-themed romance where a fake relationship turns into something real, filled with scientific humor and heartfelt moments.

title: Love on the Brain
author: Ali Hazelwood
description: A quirky romance about a neuroscientist who finds herself in an unlikely partnership with a brilliant, but frustrating colleague.

title: Love, Theoretically
author: Ali Hazelwood
description: A smart and quirky romance between a theoretical physicist and a scientist, where love and science collide in an unexpected and charming way.

title: Red, White & Royal Blue
author: Casey McQuiston
description: A sweet and funny romance between the First Son of the United States and a British prince, navigating politics, family dynamics, and their secret love affair.

title: Not in Love
author: Ali Hazelwood
description: A heartfelt romance between two scientists who navigate their own personal struggles while developing an unexpected attraction to each other.

title: Caraval
author: Stephanie Garber
description: A magical tale set in a traveling carnival, where two sisters become entwined in a high-stakes game full of mystery, danger, and romance.

title: Legendary
author: Stephanie Garber
description: The second book in the Caraval series, where Tella must navigate a dangerous game of deception and magic, with stakes higher than ever before.

title: Finale
author: Stephanie Garber
description: The thrilling conclusion to the Caraval trilogy, where the characters must confront their fates and decide who they can trust in a world filled with illusions.

title: Spectacular
author: Stephanie Garber
description: A prequel to the *Caraval* series, delving into the origins of the game and the mysterious legend of the enigmatic *Master of Caraval*.
